titleStmt.title: SII 8.165: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 165. (A.R. No. 574 of 1902). ON A SLAB SET UP IN FRONT OF THE THOUSAND-PILLARED MANDAPA IN THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
